card.name: Katta Kirifuda, Curry Bread Boy
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may ask your opponent "Do you love curry bread?". If your opponent says "Love", you may draw 2 cards. Otherwise, this creature gets +10000 power and breaks 2 additional shields.

card.name: Forever Princess, Eternal Ruler
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone For No Cost ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, shuffle this card and your graveyard into your deck instead.

card.name: Idolmaster Leo
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Whenever you put another Angel Command into the battle zone, you may draw a card. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Violent Children
card.text: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone that cost 3 or less get "speed attacker". ■ Your opponent's evolution creatures and creatures that have "speed attacker" are put into the battle zone tapped.

card.name: Karre Ganejar, Metal Lamp Djinn
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water or fire creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone or whenever it attacks, you may draw a card.

card.name: Kubrick, Spiral Accelerator
card.text: ■ Multi ■ If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets "Speed attacker". ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, if you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.
